thread.title: Syngenta says board unanimously rejected Monsanto offer
thread.title_full: Syngenta says board unanimously rejected Monsanto offer

title: Syngenta says board unanimously rejected Monsanto offer
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Wed, Aug 26, 2015, 18:14 BST - UK Markets closed Syngenta says board unanimously rejected Monsanto offer Reuters - UK Focus – 10 minutes ago 287.30 -61.45 
ZURICH, Aug 26 (Reuters) - Swiss agrichemicals group Syngenta (Xetra: 580854 - news ) said its board unanimously rejected a revised offer from suitor Monsanto, which then dropped its takeover approach. 
The offer, which Syngenta said was worth 433 Swiss francs per share as of the market close on Aug. 25, "significantly undervalued the company and was fraught with execution risk," it said in a statement on Wednesday. 
Recent market volatility had highlighted the "significant risk" for Syngenta shareholders from the structure of the proposal, which it said had not addressed key issues in sufficient detail, the statement added. (Reporting by Michael Shields; Editing by David Holmes) Tax cuts, pensions, childcare, online accounts and beer duty, here's … Related Stock Articles Follow the quotes you care about most.
